Instruction: Toast the pecans in a preheated 275°F (135°C) oven for about 15 minutes until fragrant.

Heat confectioners' sugar, white sugar, buttermilk, heavy cream, butter, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat and bring to a gentle boil. Stir constantly and cook until the mixture reaches 250 degrees F (120 degrees C), slightly above the soft ball stage.

Stir in baking soda and vanilla, be ready for the mixture to expand while stirring. Let it cool briefly, then add pecans. Stir continuously until the gloss disappears. Use a teaspoon to drop the mixture on parchment paper coated with butter non-stick spray. Allow it to cool down completely.
